page.title: 09Farming in Longhope,MayHill
page.content: The area is full of smallholdings marked on the map as farms. Many of these are houses with a small acreage around them. The biggest Farms in the area are{Court Farm, Boxbush Farm, {Dursley Cross Farm and Chessgrove Farm in{Longhope. Luxtree Farm}in{MayHill} and{Woodend Farm}in{Huntley}.Most farmers concentrate on grazing but crops such as{barley,wheat,fodder {beet,kale,turnips,grass and hay}are grown. The main problems are caused by poor drainage and road access. We visited all the named Farms and have reported on those of particular interest.
